Title: Product & Compliance Executive
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần VIVU Journeys Việt Nam
Location: Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 46 Nguyen Truong To, Truc Bach, Ba Dinh, Hanoi
Job Description:
OUR COMPANY POSITION
Vivu Journeys is a destination management company on the brink of an exciting new venture into the Travel industry. Our CEO founded his first DMC (Destination Management Company) in 1994 and by 2018 the company had expanded outside of its home, Vietnam, to span 11 countries within South East Asia, carrying close to half a million passengers throughout the region that same year. We are delighted to be re-entering the DMC space and this time now operating in UK, Ireland, Portugal, Spain, Vietnam, Laos, Thailand, Cambodia with bigger plans to expand globally.
Typically, a DMC works as a middleman buying product from hotels, transport and touring companies to sell onto Tour Operators or Travel Agents at a profit. For ViVu, in addition to connecting our partners with key suppliers, we will also be creating and operating our own product and tapping into the other hospitality arms of our Parent company, TMG.
TMG is a leading travel & hospitality business within Asia offering 4 different pillars within travel; DMC, Hotels and cruises – we own 11 hotels and 7 river and sea boats with plans to expand our assets as we move into these new markets; Airlines, we own 3 seaplanes that operate in our homeland Vietnam and are about to embark on an exciting new airline project within Asia; Online – As one of Vietnam’s most successful Online travel Agents, we are industry leaders in technology, developed inhouse.

POSITION PURPOSE
• To take ownership of the company's Health & Safety processes and checks for Hotels, transport and product partners to ensure H&S compliance across all destinations.
• To take ownership of Client Feedback and Feedback reporting.
• To ensure effective management of the product lifecycle.
• To update the supplier database for efficient retrieval and referral.
• To assist with cost benchmarking for packages and tours.
• To assist with scheduling business trips and inspection trips.
• To assist and take ownership of key product areas across Vietnam.
• To assist with additional ad hoc administrative tasks.
• To facilitate product research tasks.
• To help oversee our internal system and ensure accurate imagery, copy and rates.

MAJOR TASKS
Database Management
- Uploading correct & adequate suppliers’ information to SharePoint promptly.
- Collecting and organizing supplier information under the template and contracting senior’s guidelines.
- Complete product briefs uploading to internal systems.
Product Planning & development
- Assist in collecting contracts and tariffs, benchmarking pricing and terms according to Contracting & Product Manager guidelines.
- Communicate with suppliers to gather key information, supporting the Product Manager
- Contribute to the planning and design of new and existing tours and itineraries.
- Manage the product lifecycle efficiently.
- Develop accurate client feedback reporting and product improvement suggestions.
- Support in new product pitches to win new business.
- Support existing B2B partners to ensure we provide them with the best product and client experience
- Conduct product research and competitor analysis to identify market trends and opportunities.
Health & Safety
- Support teams across all Vivu destinations with H&S requirements and demands from country needs.
- To support suppliers with the completion of H&S.
- Manage the Health & Safety email account, serving as the primary communication point with Sanderson and Phillips
- Ensure the database is always as up to date as possible and monitor any suppliers whose H&S expires.
- Conduct in-person H&S inspections as required.
- Promptly report any concerns or challenges related to H&S compliance
Efficiency & Administration
- Contact suppliers to arrange meetings and site inspections.
- Ad hoc tasks as per the Product Manager’s request and guidelines.
- Create and complete product databases.
- Contact, walk through and ensure H&S procedures are adhered to by our Hotel and Product partners. Manage time to complete tasks carefully, thoughtfully and timely
Job Requirements:
QUALIFICATION AND SKILL REQUIREMENTS
• University graduate.
• Previous experience in tourism and hospitality either through studies or previous roles is beneficial.
• Experience of travel in Vietnam.
• Excellent interpersonal skills across a variety of cultures.
• Good command of both written and spoken English. Fluency in Vietnamese.
• Must be proficient in using technology and working with software applications (Office Suite).
OTHER SKILL & ATTRIBUTES
• A self-starter can work independently and as part of a team to meet deadlines and targets.
• Able to solve problems.
• High attention to detail.
• Creative.
• Willingness to travel extensively throughout Vietnam when required.
• Able to work flexibly when required.
• Manages work well to complete tasks carefully, thoughtfully, and in a timely fashion.
• Aligns with our TMG Company core values “MỘT”.
WHAT WE OFFER
• A competitive compensation package includes salary, allowance, bonus, and paid leave.
• Complimentary two-night Hotel stay at TMG properties.
• Exclusive travel with discounted rates for TMG staff, including our cruises, hotels, seaplanes, and F&B.
• Personal Health Insurance and 24/7 Personal Accident Insurance.
• Career pathways & professional development.
• Travel domestically & overseas as required by the business.
• Opportunity to join company team building events and ‘TMG Day’.
Field: Dịch vụ lưu trú/Nhà hàng/Khách sạn/Du lịch

3. QUYỀN LỢI

TRÁCH NHIỆM CHÍNH

Designing mechanisms to control business bonus payments/promotion programs for the Sales Division

• Xử lý các vấn đề phát sinh và thực hiện các hành động khắc phục trong phạm vi BAU
Handle issues and make corrective actions in BAU scope.
• Xây dựng năng lực khả dụng cho việc triển khai các cơ chế
Build available capacity for implementing mechanisms.

3. Xây dựng mối quan hệ chặt chẽ với các phòng ban chính để nâng cao hiệu quả.
Building strong relationships with main functions to empower effectiveness of those functions.

Title: General Accountant
Company: Jabil Vietnam Company Limited
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam, Lot I8 - 1, Saigon Hi-Tech Park (SHTP), Dist 9, HCMC
Job Description:
JOB SUMMARY
Responsible for maintaining and analyzing the company’s cost accounting system and work independently with general supervision from management.
ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
• Prepare consolidated financial statements including balance sheets, profit, loss and subsidiary statements.
• Review and analyzes general ledger account balances.
• Verify accuracy, makes recommendations for corrections.
• Prepare monthly reconciliation and balance sheets.
• Analyze financial transactions including costing issues, PPV analysis, etc.
• Analyze data related to overall profit and costing detail.
• Prepare timely reports and communication with functional areas.
• Prepare forecast, workcell statements, and margin analysis.
• Assist in the preparation of Bank documentations.
• Create and monitor a system of controls, procedures, and forms for the recordation of fixed assets.
• Prepare reports and physical count schedules related to fixed assets for internal and external reporting purposes.
• Train other employees both within and outside the department.
• Responsible for maintaining and analyzing the company’s cost accounting system.
• Prepare complex entries relating to cost accounts.
• Collect data and prepare reports on inventories, cost of goods sold and product cost variances.
• Work closely with Materials Departments to ensure appropriate product costing and conduct audit activities to ensure accurate cycle counts and physical inventory valuations.
• Adhere to all safety and health rules and regulations associated with this position and as directed by supervisor.
• Comply and follow all procedures within the company security policy.
• May perform other duties and responsibilities as assigned.
Job Requirements:
• Bachelor's Degree in Accounting, Finance
• Plus 2-4 years’ experience in a similar role
• English communication is advanced
• Detailed-oriented, logical thinking, teamwork
• Experience in FMCG/ Manufacturing or in electronics is preferred

Title: Sap Logistics Consultant
Company: Công ty Cổ phần Tập đoàn Golden Gate
Location: Tầng 6 - Tòa nhà Toyota Thanh Xuân - 315 Trường Chinh - Q. Thanh Xuân - Hà Nội, Tầng 6, tòa nhà Toyota Thanh Xuân, 315 Trường Chinh, Hà Nội
Job Description:
• Receive and handle from business’s incidents and change request within the scope of the MM/PP/QM modules in the SAP S/4 HANA system.
• Advise on processes, business operations, and propose solutions for Material Management in the SAP-ERP system to meet improvement needs and changes in the business model.
• Integrate SAP S4 HANA with systems within the Golden Gate ecosystem within the scope of the MM/PP/QM modules.
• Participate in Roll out/ Implementation projects.
• Analyze new incident/change request and discuss with the key process owners to define the solutions or workaround actions.
• Perform, test and document business processes configurations.
• Develop functional specifications and assist technical team in developing programs to meet functional requirements.
• Analyze customer business requirements, needs and objectives and map them to SAP solutions and processes to be implemented.
• Propose solutions to optimize the system and streamline business processes.
• Knowledge of archiving SAP business data is an advantage.
Job Requirements:
• 3 - 5 years experience of SAP MM/PP/QM
• Having knowledge and experience with the SAP MM module, with a preference for candidates who also have experience in SAP PP (Production & Planning) and SAP QM (Quality Management).
• Possesses consulting and business analysis skills to clarify needs and solutions with business departments as well as members of ERP projects and other related project.
• Strong interpersonal skills, good teamwork player.

Title: Senior Accountant
Company: Linfox Logistics Vietnam
Location: 7th Floor , L’ Mak Building, 147 Hai Bà Trưng, Dist 3, HCMC, Hồ Chí Minh city
Job Description:
I. Primary Purpose and Scope (Mục đích chính của công việc ) Why does this job exist?
The role exists to assist finance controller providing a strongly controlled environment consistent with corporate and local statutory requirements, they consist of:
- Ensure all of Tax declaration and Tax report to finance controller timely and accurately.
- Ensure compliance tax policy in LFVN correctly and timely .
- Monitor and ensure internal controls are effectively implemented.
- Ensure compliance with accounting standards internationally and in Vietnam and statutory requirement.
- Working with Tax department and others for auditing.

II. Accountabilities
1. Accounting and finance
- To ensure the accounting processes and policies are in place
- Ensure paperwork and data entry are captured with greater integrity and high level of accuracy.
- To review all accounting entries to system for month and year end closing, such as reconciliation, reversal, accrual, provision, account clearing and revaluation...
- To manage the inter-company
- To maintain the fixed asset register; monthly depreciation and movement reports
- To control & manage all the expense of DCs and ensure all recharge costs are invoiced in time, then debt is collected within agreed terms.
- To effectively supervise and develop a team of accounting staff.

2. Reporting
- Reports submitted to Finance controller are accurate, relevant and produced consistently within the deadline set.
- To provide the relevant information and analysis of the financial statement to enable effective management of cost and budgetary control and effective decision making.
- To coordinate and prepare financial reporting in both VN accounting standards and group’s instructions.
- To check the tax report (VAT, PIT, CIT, and WHT) and support the VAT refund procedures and application.
- To liaise with the external auditors to finalize the year end audited financial report.

III. Key Result Areas (Trách nhiệm)
- Financial reporting
- Procedures and policies compliance
- Billing and collecting
- GL accounts
- People

Decision Making (Quyền hạn)
Write down the self decision, the decision in introducing form or the decision that must be approval by higher level
1. Approve or reject non conformity with procedures and policies
3. Arrange and assign accounting jobs of team to enhance works efficiently
4. Review performance of accounting staffs
5. Discipline decision: Verbal warning form
6. Approve less than 6 day leaves (as taking leave policy)

IV. Reporting/ Contacts (Quan hệ báo cáo và quan hệ công việc)
Key persons/ titles/ organizations that have relationships with this position
Job Requirements:
- Having experience in tax is an advantage.
- Key Competencies & Skills: Good in computer skill, especially in Excel Communication
- Education, Qualification: Professional accounting qualification or degree in accounting or finance
- Language: Basic English communication is preferred
- Work Experience: 5 years working experience in finance and accounting supervising and up
- Personality: Flexible, careful, stand pressure
- Physical Requirement: Good in health
- Female or male is ok
- SAP system

BENEFIT:
- Professional Working Environment
- Attractive Salary based on 3P
- Annual health checks & Social insurance follow Vietnam Law
- Health care 24/7
- Meal allowance
- Pay insurance with the full basic salary
- Health check per year
- Salary review policy per year
- Company trip
- 13th bonus salary
- Gift for Children day if you have children
- Gift on special occasions
- Moon cake
- Christmas gift
- Holiday policy as Vietnam law
- Training opportunities
- Learning SAP, and MLS through projects
- Lucky money

Job Description:
• Responsible for the preparation, management and proper archiving of personnel records.
• Responsible for the management of the employees’ records register
• Compliance and proper application of specialized legal provisions.
• Monitoring legislative changes in the field of human resources and related fields as well as ensuring their implementation through direct consultation with the company's management
• Updating and communicating at the organization level the documents formalizing the approved organizational structure: organizational charts, Internal Regulations,
• Good management of the relationship with employees.
• Maintaining the confidentiality of personal data with which it operates.
• Organizing personnel recruitment
• Elaborating/updating job descriptions
• Coordination of employee performance evaluation sessions
• Organizing and monitoring the implementation of employee training programs

Title: Organizational Development (OD) L&D Manager
Company: Công Ty TNHH Onpoint
Location: 27B Nguyễn Đình Chiểu, Phường Đa Kao, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Tầng 4 toà nhà AB, 27B Nguyễn Đình Chiểu, P. Đa Kao, Quận 1, TP.HCM
Job Description:
The OD & L&D Manager plays a critical role in driving organizational growth and transformation by building leadership pipelines, enabling workforce readiness, and leading OD interventions that align structure and capabilities with OnPoint’s business strategy. This role ensures OnPoint’s workforce is equipped to support ongoing digital transformation and regional expansion.
Responsibilities:
1. Organizational Development (OD) & Change Management
• Lead organizational design reviews, ensuring optimal structure, role clarity, and scalability across regions.
• Drive capability mapping initiatives to define current and future skills required for business growth.
• Conduct role-health assessments and support workforce planning through data-driven insights.
• Design and implement OD interventions (e.g. restructuring, role redefinition, span of control optimization).
• Lead and support change management efforts for business transformations (ERP, AI, productivity).
• Develop and deliver change management toolkits and communication plans to support leaders and employees through change.
• Partner with leadership teams to foster an agile, high-performance, and collaborative organizational culture.
2. Learning & Development (L&D)
• Design and execute company-wide learning strategies, including:
Individual Development Plans (IDP)
Leadership Development Programs (LDP)
NextGen Leadership Program
• Build learning roadmaps for succession planning, future leadership pipelines, and business-critical skills.
• Conduct training needs analysis and design solutions to close skill gaps at all organizational levels.
• Develop learning KPIs, evaluate program effectiveness, and continuously improve based on business impact.
3. Workforce & Talent Planning
• Partner with HR Director and Business Leaders to:
Define workforce plans based on capability requirements and succession priorities.
Integrate talent insights (turnover, readiness, performance) into workforce strategies.
Identify emerging skill gaps linked to digital commerce and regional expansion.
• Support regular talent reviews, readiness assessments, and workforce capability reporting.
4. Stakeholder Management & Collaboration
• Act as a strategic partner to leadership teams, HRBPs, and functional heads.
• Guide senior leaders on OD interventions and workforce transformation initiatives.
• Manage external consultants, trainers, and vendors as needed.
• Report organizational health, workforce capability, and leadership pipeline status to HRD and CEO.
Job Requirements:
1. Education background requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business, Psychology, or Organizational Development.
2. Experience/Industry requirements:
• 5+ years of experience in OD, L&D, or strategic HRBP roles, ideally in fast-paced, digital, or multinational environments.
• Proven expertise in:
• Organizational design and workforce planning
• Capability mapping and role-health assessment
• Change management and OD interventions
• Strong facilitation and stakeholder management skills, working with senior leadership.
• Data-driven mindset with experience leveraging HR analytics and people dashboards.
Why Join OnPoint?
• Lead strategic workforce transformation across a fast-scaling regional business.
• Be a key driver in OnPoint’s leadership pipeline development and organizational agility.
• Collaborate with forward-thinking leaders in digital commerce and innovation sectors.
Benefits
• Salary: Negotiable
• Phone allowances
• Full salary in probation
• Tet, performance bonus
• Premium Health Insurance
• Full insurance package
• 15 Annual Leave + 3 Sick Leave
• Work from home: 1 day/week
• Laptop provided

Location: Pax Sky, 63-65 Ngô Thì Nhậm, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, TP Hà Nội, Tầng 1, Pax Sky, 63-65 Ngô Thì Nhậm, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, TP Hà Nội, Việt Nam
Job Description:
ABOUT THE ROLE
Join our Technology Innovations Center of Excellence (CoE) at Crossian, a fast-growing startup that achieved a milestone of $100M in 2024. In this dynamic role, you'll check in daily with your team to stay aligned on project goals and collaborate across our ecosystem with an Agile mindset infused with a unicorn-worthy startup culture.
We are building a cutting-edge Global eCommerce Platform, offering end-to-end solutions for:
• Storefront: Designing customizable and scalable online store systems that provide seamless shopping experiences and support dynamic business growth.
• Ads Manager: Integrating and optimizing advertising tools across platforms like Facebook, Google and more, enabling businesses to launch, track, and analyze marketing campaigns efficiently.
• Marketing Insights & CRM: Turning raw data from marketing campaigns, transactions, and user behavior into actionable insights to enhance customer engagement and drive smarter decision-making.

WHAT YOU WILL DO
Frontend Development & Optimization
• Design, develop, and implement user-facing features using ReactJS and NextJS.
• Optimize web applications for performance, scalability, and cross-browser compatibility.
• Lead the implementation of Server-Side Rendering (SSR) and Client-Side Rendering (CSR) for complex features.
• Ensure clean, maintainable, and scalable code through adherence to industry standards and peer code reviews.
• Debug and resolve performance bottlenecks using tools like Sentry, Kong logs, and Cloudflare.
• Translate wireframes and prototypes into high-quality, responsive, and accessible code.
• Collaborate with UI/UX designers to deliver user-centric and consistent experiences.
System Integration & Maintenance
• Work closely with backend teams to integrate APIs seamlessly into the frontend.
• Participate in deployment processes and ensure system stability through efficient debugging and issue resolution.
Cross-Functional Collaboration
• Collaborate with stakeholders to analyze requirements and break them into actionable technical tasks.
• Work with cross-functional teams (backend, QA, DevOps) to ensure the successful delivery of projects.
Knowledge Sharing & Continuous Improvement
• Share knowledge with team members and provide guidance on frontend best practices.
• Proactively suggest improvements to workflows, tools, and code quality to enhance team productivity and product quality.
Job Requirements:
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
Education: Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or related fields.
Experience
• 3-6 years of experience in frontend development with strong expertise in ReactJS, NextJS, and modern JavaScript.
• Proficient in state management tools like Redux, Recoil, or similar libraries.
• Hands-on experience in building responsive, cross-browser-compatible, and accessible web applications.
• Hands-on experience with Node.js to develop APIs and optimize SSR logic.
• Familiarity with modern frontend tools and workflows (e.g., Webpack, Vite, Git).
• Basic understanding of AWS S3, Cloudflare, or similar tools for asset delivery.
• Capable of translating business requirements into technical solutions.
• English proficiency
Soft Skills:
• Strong problem-solving skills.
• Familiarity with Agile/Scrum
Preferred Skills (but not required):
• Has knowledge of design, and coding principles (e.g.: clean code, DRY/KISS, SOLID)
• Has knowledge of Postgres, KAFKA, Elasticsearch, S3/Minio
• Knowledge of testing frameworks like Jest, React Testing Library.
• Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines for frontend applications.
• Experience with eCommerce platforms is a plus.

WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT
We’re not just about building platforms; we’re about creating a workplace where talent thrives. Here's what you’ll gain:
Exceptional Total Compensation Package
• Up to 30 months of salary per year through competitive salary packages and performance-based bonuses.
• Total annual compensation up to $55,000, reflecting your expertise and contribution.
Full salary during probation & Guaranteed 13th month salary
• 12 days work-from-home & 12 days of paid annual leave, plus seniority paid leave
• Global health insurance package for yourself and direct family members, plus annual health checkup
Growth Opportunities
• Hands-on exposure to cutting-edge technologies and complex system architecture in a global-scale project.
• Clear career advancement pathways and access to continuous professional development programs.
Global Vision
• Contribute to projects that redefine how brands connect with consumers globally.
• Opportunity to work on challenging problems in data analytics, customer engagement, and operational efficiency.
In addition to development tasks, you’ll collaborate closely with other CoEs to understand their unique challenges. With your technical expertise, you’ll continuously propose innovative solutions to elevate their performance and contribute to the overall success of the organization.

Title: Inventory Planning Specialist (500-700M VND/Year)
Company: Crossian Việt Nam
Location: Tầng 1, Toà nhà Pax Sky, 63 - 65 phố Ngô Thì Nhậm, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, Hà Nội, Tầng 1, Pax Sky, 63-65 Ngô Thì Nhậm, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, TP Hà Nội, Việt Nam
Job Description:
ABOUT THE ROLE
We are a dynamic D2C e-commerce retailer, revolutionizing the way products reach our customers. Our mission is to deliver a seamless, efficient, and customer-centric shopping experience. As we continue to scale, we are looking for a detail-oriented and results-driven Inventory Planning Specialist to join our fast-growing team. This role is integral to ensuring that our products are available to our customers without overstocking or understocking, ultimately optimizing our inventory and reducing costs.

The Inventory Planning Specialist will be responsible for managing and optimizing inventory levels across our product lines. This role requires expertise in production planning, stock arrival management, sales forecasting, and cost optimization. The ideal candidate will have strong data analysis skills, a deep understanding of e-commerce retail dynamics, and a proactive approach to solving inventory challenges.

WHAT YOU WILL DO
Production Planning:
• Collaborate with the production team to develop and maintain accurate production schedules based on sales forecasts and market demand.
• Coordinate with vendors and suppliers to ensure timely production and delivery of products.
Stock Arrival & Management:
• Monitor inbound shipments and manage stock arrival timelines to ensure products arrive on time.
• Maintain a balance between stock levels and incoming orders, identifying potential stockouts or overstock situations.
• Collaborate with logistics and warehouse teams to streamline stock receipt, storage, and inventory rotation.
Sales Planning & Forecasting:
• Collaborate with the sales team to understand the sales forecast and product demand for each period.
• Align stock arrival plans with sales and production plans to ensure products are available when needed.
• Regularly track sales performance and adjust inventory plans to align with changing demand.
Inventory Cost Optimization:
• Analyze inventory turnover and work to reduce holding costs by optimizing inventory levels.
• Allocate orders to suppliers based on inventory levels and production timelines, ensuring that orders are placed in a way that maximizes pricing efficiency.
• Work closely with suppliers to negotiate optimal pricing and terms, ensuring products are procured at competitive rates without compromising quality or availability.
• Ensure that the order allocation process supports overall cost-saving strategies and aligns with inventory optimization goals.
• Implement best practices to reduce storage, shipping, and inventory-related costs without compromising on product availability.
Data Analysis & Reporting:
• Utilize data analytics tools to track and report on inventory KPIs, including stock levels, order fulfillment rates, and inventory turnover.
• Provide insights and recommendations to senior management regarding inventory trends, sales forecasts, and supply chain improvements.
• Use data-driven insights to optimize inventory purchasing and replenishment processes.
Cross-Department Collaboration:
• Work closely with production team, sale team, merchandisers to ensure smooth coordination of inventory needs.
• Advise the customer support team on fulfillment status and inventory updates to better support customer inquiries, ensuring they have accurate and timely information regarding order status and product availability.forts.
• Provide regular reports on inventory status to ensure that inventory assets are aligned with the company’s financial goals and strategies.
Job Requirements:
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
- Bachelor’s degree in Supply Chain Management, Business Administration, Logistics, or a related field. A Master’s degree is a plus.
- 3–5 years of experience in inventory planning, demand forecasting, or supply chain management, preferably in a D2C e-commerce or retail environment.
- Proven experience working with cross-functional teams (sales, production, logistics, customer support) to align inventory with business objectives.
- Strong Excel skills; experience with data analysis tools is highly desirable.
- Familiarity with demand forecasting models, supply planning techniques, and inventory optimization strategies.
- Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to clearly present data insights and recommendations to stakeholders.
- Strong organizational and time-management skills with an ability to prioritize tasks in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
- Growth mindset with a proactive approach to problem-solving and process improvement.

WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT
At Crossian, our people are the key to our success. We believe in creating an attractive total compensation package (TCP) that not only retains employees but allows them to excel in their profession. These include:
• Total Compensation Package: 500 - 700M VND per year
• Full salary during probation
• Guaranteed 13th month salary
• 12 days work-from-home & 12 days of paid annual leave
• Global health insurance package for yourself and direct family members
• A Pantry & a Crossian Cafe stocked with goodies, ready to serve
• Lots of other company benefits including 5-star annual company trip, budget for frequent team building activities and other monthly / quarterly / annual company events
• General company T&D Program + dedicated T&D budget for managers
• Other benefits in accordance to Company's Policy and Vietnam Labor Laws
Please note, we thank all applicants for their interest, however, only those candidates selected for interviews will be contacted.

ABOUT THE ROLE
Crossian is a high-growth technology-driven e-commerce business. Behind our success is our people. As a start-up formed in 2020, we have created a fast-paced and dynamic environment, enabling our people to reach a cumulative average growth rate of over 1000% in just under 3 years. Our mission now is to build direct-to-consumer brands and increase customer lifetime value.
As our Google Performance Marketing, you'll be in charge of developing and executing performance-driven advertising campaigns on Google. Your expertise will be instrumental in optimizing campaigns, maximizing return on ad spend, and driving customer acquisition and retention. We're seeking someone with a strong background in Google performance marketing and a proven track record of achieving significant growth and driving results.

WHAT YOU WILL DO
1. Plan and execute performance marketing strategies on Google platform to acquire customers and boost customer lifetime value.
2. Plan, set up, and optimize Google advertising campaigns effectively.
3. Dive deep into campaign data to identify key performance indicators (KPIs), track campaign success, and make data-driven decisions for optimization.
4. Collaborate closely with our creative, analytics, and product teams to ensure seamless campaign execution and cohesive messaging.
5. Keep your finger on the pulse of Google advertising trends, best practices, and changes in the ecosystem, so we can stay ahead of the curve.
6. Test and iterate ad creatives, signal segments, and campaign strategies to continuously improve performance and maximize return on investment.
7. Provide regular reports to stakeholders, sharing insights, highlighting successes, addressing challenges, and identifying optimization opportunities.
Job Requirements:
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
1. A bachelor's degree in Accounting, Auditing, Finance, Data Analysis, Computer Science, IT, Mathematics, Economics, or a related field.
• Extra points if you graduated from top universities (local or global) and had a GPA that sparkled.
• Having Data certificates, specialized certificates is an advantage
2. More than 1 year of experience in performance marketing, focus on conversion objective
3. Proven track record of driving significant growth and achieving outstanding results in performance marketing campaigns.
4. Strong analytical skills and ability to extract valuable insights from data to optimize campaigns and deliver business outcomes.
5. Familiarity with performance marketing metrics such as ROAS, CPA, LTV, and conversion rates.
6. Experience in the e-commerce industry or agency marketing is a plus.

WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT
At Crossian, our people are the key to our success. We believe in creating an attractive total compensation package (TCP) that not only retains employees but allows them to excel in their profession. These include:
• Attractive salary, bonus, fair and transparent scheme, income up to $5000/month (basic salary up to $1.000 depending on capacity)
• Flexible, non-binding working time and space according to office hours
• Full salary during probation
• 12 days work-from-home & 12 days of paid annual leave
• Global health insurance package for yourself
• Guaranteed 13th month salary
• Quarterly bonus & Year-end bonus as part of our profit sharing program
• A Pantry & a Crossian Cafe stocked with goodies, ready to serve
• Lots of other company benefits including 5-star annual Summer Summit, budget for frequent team building activities and other monthly / quarterly / annual company events
• General company T&D Program
• Other benefits in accordance to Company's Policy and Vietnam Labor Laws.

Job Description:
Lập kế hoạch và triển khai hiệu quả các hoạt động truyền thông nội bộ; xây dựng, duy trì và lan tỏa văn hóa doanh nghiệp thông qua các chương trình, chính sách và thông điệp phù hợp với định hướng phát triển của Công ty.
1. LẬP KẾ HOẠCH TRUYỀN THÔNG & VĂN HÓA DOANH NGHIỆP
- Xây dựng kế hoạch truyền thông nội bộ, các sự kiện văn hóa nội bộ định kỳ và đặc biệt theo từng giai đoạn.
- Xây dựng nội dung, hình ảnh và thông điệp nhất quán về văn hóa doanh nghiệp: tầm nhìn, sứ mệnh, giá trị cốt lõi, triết lý hoạt động…
- Phối hợp cùng các phòng ban và đơn vị thành viên triển khai các hoạt động truyền thông, phong trào nội bộ.
- Kiểm soát nội dung truyền thông nội bộ trong toàn hệ thống nhằm đảm bảo tính định hướng, đồng bộ và phù hợp với văn hóa Công ty.
- Đề xuất và triển khai các chương trình xây dựng văn hóa doanh nghiệp đến Ban lãnh đạo.
2. TRIỂN KHAI CÁC HOẠT ĐỘNG CHUYÊN MÔN
- Tổ chức các hoạt động, sự kiện nội bộ (giao lưu, teambuilding, vinh danh, phong trào thi đua…) nhằm tăng tính gắn kết, tinh thần tập thể trong doanh nghiệp.
- Quản lý và phát triển các kênh truyền thông nội bộ: website, fanpage, email, bản tin… đảm bảo cập nhật thường xuyên, sáng tạo và hiệu quả.
- Biên tập các tài liệu truyền thông nội bộ, ấn phẩm, hướng dẫn thương hiệu nhằm nâng cao nhận diện và sự tự hào của CBNV.
- Tổ chức các chương trình phát triển văn hóa tổ chức, thúc đẩy tinh thần trách nhiệm, sáng tạo, tích cực trong toàn bộ đội ngũ.
- Thực hiện các hoạt động CSR, thiện nguyện, gắn kết cộng đồng theo định hướng văn hóa doanh nghiệp.
3. CÁC CÔNG VIỆC KHÁC
- Tham gia hỗ trợ các chương trình nội bộ liên quan đến nhân sự – hành chính khi được yêu cầu.
- Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ phát sinh khác theo yêu cầu của cấp quản lý trực tiếp.
Job Requirements:
1. Trình độ học vấn
- Tốt nghiệp đại học các chuyên ngành: Báo chí, Truyền thông, Quan hệ công chúng, Quản trị Nhân sự hoặc các ngành liên quan.
2. Kinh nghiệm
- Tối thiểu 3 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực truyền thông nội bộ, văn hóa doanh nghiệp
- Ưu tiên ứng viên từng xây dựng Văn hóa doanh nghiệp tại các doanh nghiệp từ 500 nhân sự trở lên
3. Kiến thức chuyên môn & kỹ năng nghiệp vụ
- Hiểu biết vững về truyền thông nội bộ, truyền thông số và văn hóa doanh nghiệp.
- Am hiểu ngành nội dung số, có khả năng cập nhật và ứng dụng các xu hướng truyền thông mới.
- Sử dụng thành thạo các công cụ thiết kế cơ bản như Canva, Photoshop hoặc phần mềm chỉnh sửa ảnh/video.
- Có khả năng xây dựng các ấn phẩm truyền thông đơn giản, truyền cảm và đúng nhận diện thương hiệu.
4. Kỹ năng chuyên môn
- Sáng tạo nội dung truyền thông hấp dẫn, đúng mục tiêu.
- Kỹ năng hoạt náo, dẫn dắt chương trình, khuấy động tinh thần tập thể.
- Giao tiếp rõ ràng, thu hút, có duyên và truyền cảm hứng.
- Nhạy bén với xu hướng truyền thông hiện đại, đặc biệt trên nền tảng số.
- Dồi dào ý tưởng tổ chức sự kiện, hoạt động nội bộ mang tính gắn kết.
5. Kỹ năng quản lý và điều phối
- Lập kế hoạch, phân công công việc và theo dõi tiến độ hiệu quả.
- Kỹ năng quản lý nhân sự, đào tạo, hỗ trợ và tạo động lực cho đội ngũ.
- Tư duy chiến lược, logic, phản biện và khả năng thích ứng với thay đổi.
- Khả năng kết nối và xây dựng môi trường làm việc tích cực.
6. Kỹ năng bổ trợ
- Quản lý thời gian, tổ chức công việc khoa học.
- Giải quyết vấn đề linh hoạt, sáng suốt.
- Kỹ năng thuyết trình, trình bày rõ ràng, lôi cuốn.

Title: Manual Tester ( Banking / Finance Domain )
Company: GTV VIETNAM
Location: Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, Hanoi, Vietnam
Job Description:
We are looking for a detail-oriented Manual Tester to join our agile team in delivering high-quality software in the banking/fintech domain. You will be responsible for designing and executing comprehensive manual test cases for web, mobile, and API interfaces, ensuring that each release meets user expectations and business requirements.

Roles and Responsibilities
• Design and execute detailed, comprehensive, and well-structured manual test cases and test plans.
• Analyze business requirements, user stories and UI/UX design to identify gaps and define testing scope.
• Perform functional, integration, exploratory, regression, and system testing.
• Conduct testing across platforms: web, mobile (iOS/Android), and APIs.
• Collaborate with developers, BAs, product owners, and other testers in Agile teams.
• Identify, log, track, and retest defects using tools such as JIRA or similar.
• Participate in sprint ceremonies such as grooming, planning, daily stand-ups, reviews, and retrospectives.
• Provide testing sign-offs and communicate risks, progress, and issues to Test Leads or PMs.
• Monitor and support quality gates by tracking testing metrics such as defect trends, test case pass rates, and escaped defects to drive continuous quality improvement.
• Coordinate and support UAT execution, including pilot runs and communication with business users or stakeholders.
• Collaborate with the Automation Test team to align on test coverage, identify automation opportunities, and support test data preparation and test result analysis.
• Maintain testing documentation on Confluence or test management tools such as Testmo or similar.
Job Requirements:
Requirements
• Minimum 3+ years of experience in software testing.
• Strong experience in manual functional testing for web, mobile, and APIs.
• Solid understanding of SDLC and STLC in Agile/Scrum environments.
• Experience in the Digital domain, preferably in banking or fintech.
• Experience with Core banking systems such as T24, Fund Transfer, FX, Bill Payment, or e-Wallet.
• Familiarity with Microservice-based architecture and relevant testing considerations.
• Experience with exploratory testing to uncover issues beyond scripted test cases.
• Strong analytical, troubleshooting, and communication skills.
• Ability to clearly document bugs and communicate effectively with cross-functional teams.
• Familiarity with quality metrics (e.g., defect rate, coverage, escaped bugs) and their role in quality gate enforcement.
• Able to communicate in English effectively during stakeholder discussions and basic presentations.
• Highly responsible, proactive, and capable of handling multiple tasks in a dynamic environment.

Nice-to-Have
• Basic knowledge of automation tools or scripting is a plus.
• Understanding of performance or security testing concepts.

Title: Automation Tester ( Banking / Finance Domain )
Company: GTV VIETNAM
Location: Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, Hanoi, Vietnam
Job Description:
We are looking for a skilled and proactive Automation Tester to join our Agile delivery team in the banking/fintech domain. You will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining automated tests across web, mobile, and API layers to ensure fast feedback, scalability, and release confidence.
Roles and Responsibilities:
• Design, develop, and maintain automated test scripts for UI (web/mobile), APIs, and backend systems.
• Evaluate and select appropriate test automation frameworks and tools based on system architecture and testing goals.
• Integrate automated tests into the CI/CD pipeline using tools such as Jenkins, Git, Docker, or similar.
• Collaborate with developers, manual testers, BA, and product owners to ensure comprehensive test coverage.
• Identify automation opportunities and propose solutions to optimize test effort across sprints/releases.
• Perform regression, end-to-end (E2E), integration, and smoke tests using automated suites.
• Analyze failed test results, troubleshoot issues, and work closely with developers for quick resolution.
• Participate in automation code reviews to ensure quality, consistency, and adherence to test framework standards.
• Track and report automation progress, risks, and coverage metrics to the Test Lead and other stakeholders.
• Monitor and support quality gates by maintaining automation health and tracking test coverage trends.
• Share knowledge and mentor other team members on automation frameworks and best practices.
• Maintain test scripts, reusable components, and supporting documentation.
• Design, implement, and execute performance tests using tools such as K6 or Jmeter to validate system scalability, responsiveness, and stability under load.
Job Requirements:
• Minimum 3+ years of experience in software testing, with 2+ years in automation.
• Hands-on experience with one or more automation frameworks:
◦ UI: Selenium WebDriver, Cypress, Playwright
◦ API: REST Assured, Postman, Pact
◦ Mobile: Appium
• Strong programming skills in Java, JavaScript, or similar languages.
• Solid knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and tools such as Jenkins, GitHub Actions, or Docker.
• Practical experience with Behavior-Driven Development (BDD) and tools such as Cucumber, SpecFlow, or similar, including writing and maintaining feature files using Gherkin syntax.
• Hands-on experience with performance testing tools such as JMeter, K6, or equivalent, including scripting, test execution, and analysis of key performance metrics (e.g., response time, throughput, p95, error rate).
• Understanding of Agile/Scrum methodology and tester’s role in it.
• Experience testing in microservice-based architectures and distributed systems.
• Familiarity with quality metrics and using automation to support release readiness and quality gates.
• Strong problem-solving, debugging, and communication skills.
• Comfortable working in a fast-paced, dynamic environment with tight release cycles.
• Able to communicate in English effectively during stakeholder discussions and basic presentations.

Title: Nhân Viên Kinh Doanh Xuất Khẩu
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Thương Mại Tràng An- Việt Nam
Location: 27 Trần Quốc Hoàn, Dịch Vọng Hậu, Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội, Vietnam, Số 27 Trần Quốc Hoàn, Phường Dịch Vọng Hậu, Quận Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội
Job Description:
1. Chức năng:
• Thực hiện công việc kinh doanh: chăm sóc khách hàng được phân công
• Xử lý và thực hiện các đơn hàng
• Hoàn thành chỉ tiêu kinh doanh của Trưởng phòng giao

2. Nhiệm vụ
• Chăm sóc khách hàng, bán hàng theo chính sách và chỉ tiêu Công ty
• Thực hiện các đơn hàng được duyệt để giao hàng cho khách đúng thời hạn
• Tổng hợp chi phí hoạt động của phòng
• Thực hiện các công việc do Trưởng phòng giao

3. Mô tả công việc
3.1 Tìm kiếm, chăm sóc khách hàng
• Thực hiện tìm kiếm, tiếp cận khách hàng mới bằng các kênh thông tin: hội chợ, triển lãm, giới thiệu, quảng cáo…
• Lập báo giá, catalog sản phẩm trình Trưởng phòng duyệt trước khi gửi khách hàng
• Đàm phán giá cả, chính sách thanh toán với khách hàng trong phạm vi Trưởng phòng cho phép
• Thực hiện việc tư vấn, chăm sóc khách hàng theo tần suất phù hợp đối với từng khách hàng: tồn kho, tình hình tiêu thụ sản phẩm, vướng mắc, khiếu nại
• Cập nhật các thông tin cho khách hàng: sản phẩm mới, các thay đổi về sản phẩm, thay đổi về chính sách…

3.2 Chốt đơn hàng - thực hiện đơn hàng
• Khi khách đặt hàng, cần xem xét đơn hàng trên cơ sở phù hợp với nhu cầu của khách hàng và khả năng thực hiện của Nhà máy để chốt đơn
• Thực hiện theo các bước của Quy trình thực hiện đơn hàng
• Báo cáo Trưởng phòng khi có vấn đề phát sinh để có giải pháp xử lý kịp thời.

3.3 Tổng hợp chi phí hoạt động của phòng
• Thực hiện thanh toán các chi phí phát sinh liên quan đến thủ tục nhập khẩu theo quy định Công ty
• Cập nhật các chi phí phát sinh của phòng theo biểu mẫu
• Tổng hợp chi phí hoạt động hàng tháng báo cáo Trưởng phòng trước ngày 05 hàng tháng.

3.4 Lên kế hoạch bán hàng, thực hiện doanh thu cho tháng tiếp theo
• Kế hoạch triển khai tìm kiếm khách hàng mới
• Lên kế hoạch sản lượng/ từng khách hàng cho tháng mới vào tuần 3 hàng tháng
Job Requirements:
Yêu cầu:
- Tốt nghiệp các trường ĐH Ngoại thương, Kinh tế Quốc dân, Đại học Quốc gia, Ngoại ngữ, Thương mại ngành Kinh doanh quốc tế, QTKD, Marketing, Kinh tế…, yêu thích kinh doanh Xuất khẩu.
- Tiếng Trung hoặc tiếng anh thành thạo (nghe, nói, đọc, viết).
- Sử dụng thành thạo tin học văn phòng: Word, Excel…
- Có kinh nghiệm trong ngành xuất nhập khẩu, biết về phần mềm khai hải quan điện tử
- Yêu thích công việc kinh doanh
- Giao tiếp tốt, có khả năng đàm phán
- Ưu tiên người có kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực xuất khẩu hàng hóa ra thị trường nước ngoài

* Quyền lợi
- Thu nhập lên tới 35 triệu/tháng
- Được tham gia BHXH, BHYT, BHTN, lương tháng 13, thưởng và các phúc lợi khác theo quy định của công ty,

Title: Accounting Supervisor
Company: Shinhan Vietnam Finance Company Limited
Location: Lầu 19, tòa nhà The Mett, số 15 Trần Bạch Đằng, phường Thủ Thiêm, Thành phố Thủ Đức, 19F, 15 Tran Bach Dang, Thu Thiem, Thu Duc City, Ho Chi Minh City
Job Description:
I. Job Summary:
The role is a one of mainly Accounting function in Finance Division. Their role is to complete payments and control expenses by verifying and reconciling invoices and payment related supporting documents to proceed payment to vendors in an accurate, efficient and timely manne. All transactions must be in line with company's policy, local tax regulations and accounting framework. Besides, they are responsible for the financial processing of transactions for an organization. Their duties include daily book keeping and reconcile all relevant account to ensure all account balance matching with General Ledger balance.

II. Key Roles & Responsibilities:
1. Checking and processing PRs on Lotus notes system and Sun System (30%):
• Ensure the payments are in line with company's policies and procedures such as expense management policy, purchasing policy and in compliance with local tax regulations.
• Ensure in- charged PROs is on due for settlement with suppliers or staffs

2. Month end closing activity and reconciliation (25%)
• Ensure month-end closing activities in on time
• Accrual related to in-charged sections
• Booking allocation for prepaid expenses
• Monthly reconciliation related accounts.

3. Fixed assets management (25%)
• Make to register new asset, update information of asset (from Project Cost to FA according to AP function of PIC)
• Reconcile Fixed Asset before and after running depreciation
• Reconcilation for FA accounts, Project cost (define: Client code, contract no)
• Print FA code, Follow up label FA code and Handover form
• Check minutes: Asset liquiation and any update FA form
• Prepare quaterly FA Report for Notes of Financial Statement and Group Package Report (Property&Equipment)
• Join in annual asset physical count with relevant departments/divisions.

4. Other tasks (20%)
• Follow up with users to fill supplemented invoices
• Create payment transfer on Citibank and get payment approval to be completed for payment, strong attention to bank account payable, bank code avoiding refund due to wrong bank
• Assigned by CA, Accounting Manager and Line Manager ( if requirement )
Job Requirements:
1. Qualification
• University graduate major in Finance, Accounting, Business Management, Economics, Statistics.
• Hold relevant Accounting/Finance certifications is a plus
2. Work Experience
• At least 5 years of experience working in accounting department.
• Experiences in delivering group financial/managerial reports.
• Practical experience in a business-driven culture and multi-national corporations is an advantage.
3. Knowledge
• Familiar with accounting systems and processes.
• Proficiency in MS Office.
• Expertise in Vietnamese Tax Law, VAS is an advantage.
• Understanding of banking/consumer finance industry is an advantage
4. Skills
• Good Excel skills
• Good communication, well-organized, time management, good reporting skills.
• Ability to work in time sensitive, team environment with attention to details.
• Ability to work independently and as a member of a team

Benefits

Title: Cyber Security Engineer ( AppSec ) IT Security
Company: GTV VIETNAM
Location: Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, Hanoi, Vietnam
Job Description:
We are looking for a skilled and motivated Application Security Engineer to join our growing IT Security team. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience in secure code review, DevSecOps integration, and working closely with development teams to embed security throughout the software development lifecycle (SDLC).

Roles and Responsibilities:
- Conduct secure code reviews to identify and remediate vulnerabilities early in the SDLC.
- Integrate security testing tools into CI/CD pipelines to enable continuous and automated application security scanning.
- Collaborate with DevOps, QA, and development teams to ensure the timely resolution of security issues.
- Perform threat modeling for new features and system designs.
- Execute application security testing, including SAST, DAST, SCA, and API security assessments.
- Participate in risk assessments and support secure architecture reviews.
- Ensure compliance with security standards and frameworks such as PCI DSS 4.0, ISO 27001:2022, and NIST CSF 2.0.
- Stay up to date with evolving application threats (e.g., OWASP Top 10, CWE Top 25).
Job Requirements:
- Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Cybersecurity, Computer Science, or a related field.
- From 3 years of hands-on experience in application security or secure software development.
- Strong understanding of application security fundamentals and DevSecOps practices.
- Relevant certifications are a plus (e.g., GIAC GWAPT, GWEB, eWPT).
- Proficient in secure coding techniques (e.g., input validation, secure authentication, error handling).
- Familiarity with standards like OWASP ASVS, ISO 27001, and PCI DSS.
- Strong collaboration skills and ability to work with global or distributed development teams.
- Analytical thinking and excellent communication skills (written and verbal).
- Ability to travel when required to support regional business needs.

Title: Sales Planning Manager

This position is responsible for developing, executing, and optimizing sales strategies, policies, initiatives to drive business growth and achieve sales targets. This role involves strategic planning, performance management, incentives design, contest & promotion development, collaboration with internal and external stakeholders to ensure efficient sales operations.

• Expertise in change management and driving transformation

4.Skills

• Excellent communication and leadership

Title: Senior Payable Accountant
Company: CORSAIR MARINE INTERNATIONAL CO., LTD
Location: Số 7, Gò Ô Môi, Phường Phú Thuận, Quận 7, Tp.HCM, 7 Go O Moi , Phu Thuan Ward., District 7, Ho Chi Minh City
Job Description:
• Nhận hóa đơn/tờ khai HQ để kiểm tra các thông tin và đối chiếu với phiếu nhập kho cũng như PO. Làm việc với nhân viên mua hàng hoặc Logistic khi phát hiện ra sai sót.
Receive invoices/bills/customs declaration forms to check information and match with GRNs and POs. Work with Purchasing or Logistic if errors/mistakes are found.
• Nhập hóa đơn/tờ khai vào GSS đảm bảo AP được cập nhật thường xuyên.
Key invoice/bills/customs declarations in GSS to make sure AP update
• Chuẩn bị hồ sơ thanh toán cho nhà cung cấp (trong nước và nước ngoài) bao gồm hóa đơn/tờ khai, PO/contract và thực hiện lệnh chi trên hệ thống internet banking. Cập nhật các hồ sơ cần thiết lên hệ thống internet banking hoặc gửi ra ngân hàng theo đường chuyển phát theo đúng yêu cầu.
Prepare payment to local/overseas suppliers including invoices/customs declaration forms/PO/Contract and using internet banking to make payment order. Upload necessary supporting documents to internet bank system or send hard copies to the banks as requested.
• Tiếp tục theo dõi các khoản thanh toán, sẵn sàng trả lời hoặc bổ sung hồ sơ theo các yêu cầu của ngân hàng cho tới khi khoản tiền được chuyển tới nhà cung cấp.
Follow up the payments, answer any queries or provide documents as required by the banks until the payment is completed.
• Nhập các khoản đã thanh toán lên GSS để AP được cập nhật, lưu giữ các chứng từ thanh toán làm bằng chứng cho việc kiểm tra về sau.
Key payments in GSS to update AP, maintain properly payment documents for audit purpose.
• Theo dõi các khoản trả trước nhà cung cấp cho đến khi nhận được phiếu nhập kho/hóa đơn/tờ khai HQ. Soạn thảo và cung cấp thư giải trình cho ngân hàng đối với các khoản trả trước nhà cung cấp nước ngoài trong các trường hợp cần thiết. Thúc giục bộ phận mua hàng hoàn thành các nghĩa vụ nhận hàng và kê khai hải quan đối với những mặt hàng mua theo hình thức trả trước.
Follow up prepayment to suppliers until GRN/invoice/customs declaration are received correctly. Prepare and provide explanation letter to banks for any overseas payments if required. Chase up buyers to receive and complete custom declaration for items purchased under prepayment conditions.
• Hàng tháng thực hiện kiểm tra đối chiếu bảng kê ngân hàng để kịp thời phát hiện các sai sót. Xác nhận công nợ với nhà cung cấp theo yêu cầu.
Monthly, prepare bank reconciliation and correct any mistake. If required, provide confirmation with Vendors’ Account Statement.
• Hàng năm, chuẩn bị thư xác nhận công nợ và gửi đến nhà cung cấp theo yêu cầu kiểm toán. Tiếp tục theo dõi đảm bảo nhà cung cấp xác nhận và gửi lại cho kiểm toán.
Yearly, prepare year-end balance confirmation as required by auditors and send to vendors. Chasing vendors to ensure confirmations are received by auditor.
• Các công việc khác theo sự phân công của cấp trên.
Other jobs as requested by managers

• Detailed oriented.
• Organizational Skills.
• Time management skill
• Solving problem skill
• Keep secret all information related to company policy
• CV in English is an advantage

Title: Fabric Merchandiser
Company: CN TPHCM - Cong Ty TNHH Ha Hae Viet Nam
Location: Licogi 9 Office Building, No. 35, Street 2, Quarter 4, An Phu Ward, Thu Duc City, HCMC, Licogi 9 Office Building, No. 35, Street 2, Quarter 4, An Phu Ward, District 2, HCMC
Job Description:
• Oversees the sourcing, development, and management of all fabrics used in garment production.
• Source and develop seasonal fabrics aligned with seasonal line plans and buyer aesthetics.
• Assess price competitiveness, test performance, and suitability for end use.
• Manage strategic mill partners and develop mill strategies based on their core strengths
• Maintain a deep knowledge of mills across key sourcing countries (China, Vietnam, Indonesia, India, etc.), and have the ability to source the right fabric from the right mill.
• Negotiate with mills to secure best prices, lead times, and MOQs.
• Manage and update core fabric information
• Maintain strong working relationships with local and international mills.
• Set up and maintain a digital and physical fabric library
• Ensure samples, swatches, and test results are systematically stored and retrievable.
• Support design and development teams with library access and usage.
• Manage mill compliance and sustainability data tracking.
Job Requirements:

Title: Business Intelligence Analyst (Data & Strategy)
Company: Fastboy Marketing
Location: 56a Lê Khôi, Phú Thạnh, Tân Phú, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 56A Lê Khôi, P. Phú Thạnh, Q. Tân Phú, Tp. Hồ Chí Minh
Job Description:
Proactively collect, process and analyze business data, thereby building a multi-dimensional reporting system to help the Board of Directors have an overview, make accurate and timely decisions. Turn discrete data into a clear picture, detect trends and propose specific improvement actions.

We are looking for a data specialist with deep analytical skills, systematic thinking and a particularly high sense of ethics and information security, to:

● Work directly with the CEO/Board of Directors to understand business requirements and data orientation.

● Proactively identify the data sources needed to complete the report.

● Design and present dashboards, visual analysis reports by Power BI, Google Data Studio, advanced Excel...

● Analyze trends: increase/decrease in revenue, high/low performance products, return rates, reasons for cancellation, costs - profits...

● Give assessment from data and propose specific improvement actions.

● Coordinate with departments: Business, Engineering, Accounting to standardize data sources.

● Design standardized reporting frameworks for each field: equipment, POS, merchant, marketing, finance...

● Automate the analysis process and periodic reporting: weekly/monthly/quarterly.
Job Requirements:
● Minimum 3 years of experience in business data analysis or equivalent position.

● Proficient in tools:

→ Advanced Excel (Pivot, Power Query)

→ Power BI, Google Data Studio or equivalent

→ Basic SQL

● Strong logical and systematic thinking - can build reports from discrete data.

● Have storytelling skills through data - present clearly and easy to understand.

● Have basic knowledge of: corporate finance, POS, merchant, logistics, sales.

● Have the ability to work independently, proactively, without waiting for detailed assignments.

● Commit to information confidentiality, do not use data for any purpose other than work.

________________________________________

Priority (not required):

● Experience in the POS equipment industry, e-commerce, or sales management software.

● Have the mindset or experience in designing standardized reporting systems according to business models.

● Knowing how to use Python or R for processing, visualization data is a big advantage.

____________________________________

Required personal qualities:

● Proactive: Know how to find work, no need for specific assignments.

● Logical: Good analysis, understand where the data is and what it means.

● Systemic: Know how to connect separate parts to give a panoramic view.

● Honesty & high professional ethics: Committed to not sharing or leaking information whether still working or after leaving the job.

● Good communication: Can work with both technical, accounting and sale team.

Title: (Urgent) Dyehouse Lab Manager

- Excellent communication skills

Title: Data Scientist, Data & AI Team, Global eCommerce Platform. Total Annual Compensation: $70,000-$90,000
Company: Crossian Việt Nam
Location: Tầng 1, Toà nhà Pax Sky, 63 - 65 phố Ngô Thì Nhậm, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, Hà Nội, Tầng 1, Pax Sky, 63-65 Ngô Thì Nhậm, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, TP Hà Nội, Việt Nam
Job Description:
ABOUT THE ROLE
At Crossian, data science is not just analytics, it's a strategic lever powering our global eCommerce engine. As we grow from a $200M valuation toward $1B, the Data & AI Team plays a central role in designing models and optimization engines that fuel revenue, efficiency, and growth at scale.
As a Data Scientist, you will translate real business challenges into elegant analytical frameworks and machine learning solutions. From rigorous A/B testing to predictive modeling, from optimization algorithms to supply chain forecasting, your insights and models will directly influence how we acquire customers, plan inventory, price products, and build smarter features.
You'll work cross-functionally with product, marketing, operations, and engineering teams to ensure your models are not only technically excellent but also business-relevant and production-ready.
If you're passionate about solving high-impact business problems with data, Crossian is the place to make it happen.

WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT
Job Requirements:
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
Education & Experience
• Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related quantitative field.
• Senior level: 5+ years of hands-on experience in data science or applied ML roles, preferably in eCommerce, adtech, fintech, or supply chain.
• Intermediate level: 3+ years of relevant experience with at least one deployed solution or experimentation framework.
Technical Proficiency
• Strong Python or R skills (e.g., scikit-learn, NumPy, pandas, statsmodels, TensorFlow, PyTorch).
• Advanced SQL for data extraction, joining, and preprocessing.
• Deep understanding of statistical inference, hypothesis testing, experimental design, and optimization.
• Familiarity with cloud-based platforms (AWS/GCP) and version control (Git).
Soft Skills & Mindset
• Clear, structured communication with both technical and non-technical audiences.
• Curiosity to dig into ambiguous problems and turn them into measurable, data-driven solutions.
• Collaborative spirit; ability to work in Agile squads with product managers, engineers, and analysts.
Preferred (Not Required)
• Prior experience in eCommerce, logistics, or pricing optimization.
• Familiarity with tools like MLflow, SageMaker, Vertex AI, Airflow.
• Publications, open-source contributions, or ML competition experience (e.g., Kaggle, NeurIPS).

Title: Chief Accountant (BOT Projects)
Company: Corona Resort & Casino Phu Quoc, Vietnam
Location: Chơn Thành, Bình Phước, Việt Nam, Bai Dai Area, Ganh Dau Commune, Phu Quoc District, Kien Giang Province, Vietnam
Job Description:
The Chief Accountant manages all financial aspects of infrastructure (BOT) projects, include overseeing all accounting operations, financial records and reporting, tax and legal compliance, supervise accounting staff, and provide overall strategy from 1st to 3rd year of financial direction for all relevant Departments and the Management.

* Responsibilities

• Develop and implement management accounting reports to support business planning, budgeting, and strategic decision-making by the Board of Directors.
• Make and manage capital resources and operating budgets.
• Oversee the day to day financial & accounting responsibilities of BOT Projects.
• Responsible for all tax and financial related issues with related banks and Government departments.
• Develops reporting and monitoring systems to accomplish company objectives, maintain control of assets and fulfill regulatory compliance.
• Prepare financial & Tax reports and corporate governance reports following accounting norms, tax regulations of tax authorities fully and timely.
• Cost & Revenue control to be implemented within the approved budget or approved by the approval levels. Monitor and control project costs, particularly construction costs, ensuring they align with budgets and providing analysis on variances.
• Provide advice and control payment terms and other provisions related to contracts signed with vendors, constructors, consultants, ensuring compliance with tax regulations, the Company’s financial policy and other guidelines.
• Supervise, train, and evaluate the performance of the accounting department staff.
• Foster a professional and efficient accounting team, ensuring clear task assignments and skill development.
• Directly work with tax authorities for solutions and answers to all matters in relation with accounting and tax. Be responsible for interpreting all data with tax authorities when proceeding tax final accounts for the company.
• Work with audit to issue audit financial statement.
• Collaborate with other departments and external stakeholders, including banks, project developers, and relevant government Departments.
• Manage the accounting complexities related to revenue recognition, capital expenditure, and long-term asset accounting specific to BOT projects.
• Understanding and managing financial aspects related to project financing, concessions, and potential divestment or transfer phases is also critical.
Job Requirements:
• Work based at Dong Nai (Binh Phuoc) Vietnam.
• Bachelor Degree or higher in Finance or Accounting.
• Certification of Chief Accountant.
• Minimum 3 year of experience in financial management position in infrastructure (Build - Operate -Transfer) projects. Strong in finance capital, operation Budgets and report.
• Solid knowledge of Vietnamese Accounting, Tax regulations, Tax Laws
• Proficient at office computer, accounting software SAP and others.
• Strong analytical, problem-solving, managing & leadership skills are required.
• Fluent in English and Vietnamese are required. Superior diplomatic and communication skills.
• Capacity of teamwork, persuasion and negotiation with coworkers, partners, shareholder, bank, project developers and local authorities.
• Capacity of processing complicated professional issues within law frame, able to analyze, provide solutions.

Title: Thực Tập Sinh Merchandiser (Ngành May Mặc)

Location: Tầng 9, Tòa nhà Vinafor, 127 Lò Đúc, Hai Bà Trưng, Hà Nội, Tầng 9 tòa nhà VinaFor, 127 Lò Đúc, Hai Bà Trưng, Hà Nội
Job Description:

• Hỗ trợ tiếp nhận và kiểm tra thông tin đơn hàng, tài liệu kỹ thuật từ khách hàng hoặc Trưởng bộ phận
• Phối hợp cùng Merchandiser chính để lập kế hoạch thực hiện từng bước của đơn hàng
• Hỗ trợ chuẩn bị mẫu, kiểm tra yêu cầu may mẫu, gửi mẫu đi và theo dõi phản hồi từ khách hàng
• Cập nhật và theo dõi thời gian giao hàng, tiến độ đồng bộ nguyên phụ liệu (NPL)
2. Phối hợp với các đơn vị gia công:
• Hỗ trợ liên hệ, làm việc với các đơn vị gia công về kế hoạch sản xuất và yêu cầu kỹ thuật
• Hỗ trợ trong việc lập hợp đồng hoặc phụ lục hợp đồng với các đối tác
• Phối hợp tổ chức duyệt mẫu/mẫu đối tại xưởng hoặc đơn vị gia công
3. Theo dõi sản xuất và hỗ trợ giao hàng:

• Kiểm tra tình trạng sử dụng NPL: cấp thiếu, sai định mức, hàng lỗi...
• Hỗ trợ chuẩn bị chứng từ: packing list, mẫu lưu, phiếu giao hàng
• Hỗ trợ liên hệ bộ phận QC và khách hàng để sắp xếp kiểm hàng, xuất hàng đúng hạn
4. Công việc hỗ trợ khác:
• Hỗ trợ tìm kiếm nhà cung cấp hoặc đơn vị gia công mới khi có yêu cầu
• Lập báo cáo công việc hàng tuần
• Thực hiện các công việc khác theo sự phân công của Trưởng bộ phận
Job Requirements:
• Sinh viên năm cuối hoặc mới tốt nghiệp chuyên ngành Công nghệ may hoặc các ngành liên quan
• Tiếng Anh giao tiếp cơ bản, đọc hiểu tài liệu kỹ thuật đơn giản
• Chăm chỉ, cẩn thận, có tinh thần trách nhiệm và học hỏi
• Sử dụng tốt Excel và các công cụ văn phòng
• Có thể thực tập full-time trong tối thiểu 3 tháng

Title: Trưởng Phòng Nghiên Cứu và Phát triển sản phẩm Thuốc (Nghệ An)
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Tập Đoàn BRG
Location: Nguyễn Thị Minh Khai, Quang Trung, Vinh, Nghệ An, Việt Nam, Website: www.brggroup.vn. Tòa nhà BRG, 198 Trần Quang Khải, Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội
Job Description:
1. Lập kế hoạch nghiên cứu, triển khai nghiên cứu sản phẩm và thiết kế, lựa chọn bao bì sản phẩm:
• Tiếp nhận chỉ đạo công việc từ cấp trên trực tiếp là Giám đốc công ty hoặc Giám đốc nhà máy/ Phó giám đốc chuyên môn để triển khai cho phòng thực hiện.
• Lập dự trù nguyên phụ liệu, máy móc, trang thiết bị phục vụ cho kế hoạch nghiên cứu sản phẩm.
• Chỉ đạo và theo dõi nghiên cứu các sẩn phẩm trong danh mục nghiên cứu trên các lĩnh vực sau:
+ Tham gia làm nghiên cứu, chỉ đạo và theo dõi nghiên cứu sản phẩm mới.
+ Tham gia làm nghiên cứu, chỉ đạo và theo doi nghiên cứu độ ổn định của thuốc.
+ Tham gia làm nghiên cửu, chi đạo và theo dõi nghiên cứu cải tiền nâng cao chất lượng sản phẩm, nghiền cứu thay đổi công thức bảo chế để giảm giá thành, nghiên cứu khi thay đổi nhà sản xuất nguyên liệu/ tá dược để đa dạng hóa nguồn cung ứng nguyên liệu/ tá dược.
+ Tham gia làm nghiên cứu, chỉ đạo và theo dõi nghiên cứu các sản phẩm phải thử tương đương sinh học, thử độc tinh, sản phẩm mới phải thử lâm sàng.
+ Tham gia làm nghiên cứu, chỉ đạo và theo dõi quá trình lựa chọn, thiết kế bao bi, mẫu nhãn bao gồm cả việc thay đổi bao bi, mẫu nhãn.
+ Tham gia, chỉ đạo và theo dồi quá trình mua, đặt hàng in ấn bao bì đảm bảo lô hàng đầu tiên đúng với các thông số kỹ thuật/ mẫu mã đã đăng ký.
+ Tham gia, chỉ đạo và theo dõi quá trình bổ sung thiết bị, khuôn mẫu, phụ kiện...
2. Quản lý, triển khai, theo dõi hồ sơ đăng ký thuốc, thực phẩm chức năng, vật tư y tế loại A, mỹ phẩm..... tại Bộ y tế, Sở y tế:
• Tham mưu trực tiếp cho Giám đốc công ty công tác xử lý văn bản vả hồ sơ đăng ký sản phẩm liên quan tại Bộ y tế, Sở y tế vả các ban ngành chức năng khác.
• Quản lý, tham gia, chi đạo và theo dõi việc soạn thảo, bổ sung hồ sơ đăng ký sản phẩm mới, hồ sơ thay đổi, hồ sơ gia hạn,... của các sản phẩm bao gồm: thuốc, thực phẩm chức năng, vật tư y tế loại A, mỹ phẩm.
Quản lý, chi đạo và theo dõi việc nộp hồ sơ, tiền trình xử lý hồ sơ tại các Cơ quan chức năng ở Bộ y tế, Sở y tế.
3.Triển khai sản xuất thử, bàn giao sản phẩm từ quy mô phòng thí nghiệm sang quy mô sản xuât công nghiệp, cải tiền quy trình sản xuất.
• Chỉ đạo và theo dõi việc chuyển giao sản phẩm vào sản xuất trong phần xưởng.
• Tham gia việc soạn thảo các tài liệu sản xuất gốc, quy trình pha chế gốc và quy trình đóng gói gốc, hồ sơ lô pha chế và hồ sơ lô đóng gói.
- Tham gia theo dõi và soạn thảo các SOP's trong chương trình triển khai GMP của Công ty
Job Requirements:
- Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên chuyên ngành Dược sỹ hoặc sản xuất Dược
- Kinh nghiệm 02 năm trở lên ở vị trí tương đương
- Nắm vững kiến thức về Dược phẩm, quy trình phát triển sản phẩm, Nghiên cứu lâm sàng, quản lý dự án nghiên cứu

Title: Trường Bộ Phận Mua Hàng (Hà Nam)
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Tập Đoàn BRG
Location: Công ty CPPT Golf Thiên Đường, Quang Thừa, Tượng Lĩnh, Kim Bảng, Hà Nam, Website: www.brggroup.vn. Tòa nhà BRG, 198 Trần Quang Khải, Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội
Job Description:
CHỨC NĂNG & NHIỆM VỤ (TASKS & RESPONSIBILITIES)
(Liệt kê các chức năng, nhiệm vụ chính/ List main job tasks and responsibilities)
1. Lập kế hoạch mua hàng:
• Xây dựng kế hoạch mua hang theo nhu cầu của công ty, đảm bảo cung ứng đầy đủ nguyên vật liệu, trang thiết bị phục vụ hoạt động kinh doanh.
• Phối hợp với các phòng ban để xác định nhu cầu mua hàng và lên kế hoạch phù hợp.
2. Tổ chức và quản lý hoạt động mua hàng:
• Tìm kiếm, đánh giá và đàm phán với các nhà cung cấp để đảm bảo chất lượng và giá cả hợp lý.
• Kiểm soát quy trình đặt hàng, theo dõi tiến độ giao hàng và xử lý các vấn đề phát sinh.
• Xây dựng và duy trì mối quan hệ tốt với nhà cung cấp chiến lược.
3. Kiểm soát ngân sách và chi phí mua hàng:
• Giám sát ngân sách mua hàng, tối ưu chi phí và đảm bảo hiệu quả tài chính.
• Đánh giá và đề xuất giải pháp tiết kiệm chi phí mà vẫn đảm bảo chất lượng.
4. Quản lý đội ngũ nhân sự:
• Tổ chức, phân công công việc cho nhân viên trong bộ phận mua hàng.
• Đào tạo, hướng dẫn và nâng cao kỹ năng chuyên môn cho nhân viên.
5. Giám sát chất lượng và tuân thủ quy định:
• Đảm bảo hàng hóa, nguyên vật liệu mua vào đạt tiêu chuẩn chất lượng theo yêu cầu.
• Tuân thủ các quy định pháp lý liên quan đến mua sắm và hợp đồng.
6. Báo cáo và phân tích:
• Lập báo cáo định kỳ về tình hình mua hàng, chi phí, hiệu suất nhà cung cấp.
• Đề xuất các chiến lược mua hàng hiệu quả hơn dựa trên dữ liệu phân tích.
7. Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác theo sự phân công của quản lý trực tiếp.
Job Requirements:
Trinh độ học vẫn (Educational background): Tốt nghiệp Đại học
Chuyên ngành (Major): Quản trị Kinh doanh, Kinh tế, Logistics hoặc các ngành liên quan

Kinh nghiệm (Experience): Có ít nhất 3-5 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực mua hàng, trong đó ít nhất 2 năm ở vị trí quản lý
Kiến thức (Knowledge):
Kỹ năng/Khả năng (Skills/ Abilities):
• Kỹ năng đàm phán, thương lượng và quản lý hợp đồng
• Kỹ năng lãnh đạo, quản lý đội nhóm hiệu quả.
• Thành thạo tin học văn phòng (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) và các phản mềm quản lý mua hàng.
• Tiếng Anh giao tiếp tốt là một lợi thế
Thái độ (Attinude):
• Thân thiện, cởi mở
• Luôn luôn học hỏi để nâng cao kỹ năng.
• Quyết liệt để thực hiện tốt các nhiệm vụ được giao

Title: Senior Brand Advocacy & Content Specialist
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Sữa Việt Nam (Vinamilk)
Location: Vinamilk Tower - No. 10 Tan Trao, Tan Phu Ward, District 7, Số 10, Tân Trào, P. Tân Phú, Q.7, Tp. HCM
Job Description:
Job Overview:
Develop and implement strategic initiatives to enhance brand advocacy and expand brand influence across digital and community platforms. Collaborate cross-functionally to establish standardized frameworks and manage content partnership programs that drive credibility and engagement.
Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with Brand, Strategy, Legal, and Corporate Affairs teams to understand product/category insights and define advocacy-driven communication strategies.
- Plan and execute community-based and influencer-driven brand initiatives through parenting groups, forums, online communities, and macro/micro opinion leaders.
- Develop and maintain the Brand Advocacy Playbook, including communication angles, partner guidelines, publishing schedules, and campaign measurement models.
Lead content partnership efforts:
- Coordinate with media platforms, publishers, and community-based networks to develop collaborative content that promotes positive brand positioning.

Job Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in communications, Marketing, Sociology, or related disciplines.
- Minimum 2–3 years of experience in social content, influencer marketing, or advocacy strategy in FMCG or digital agencies.
- Strong ability to translate consumer and category insights into advocacy strategies and content plans.
- Experience in developing advocacy playbooks is a strong advantage.
- Proven coordination skills across internal and external stakeholders.
- Creative, analytical, and result-oriented with strong project management capabilities
